full_summary:
# **TARP TIE DOWN KITS**
## English Title: [TARP TIE DOWN KITS](#tarp-tie-down-kits)
## French Title: [KIT D'ARRIMAGE DE BÂCHE](#kit-d'arrimage-de-bâche)

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: PW-23-01026962
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: W8486-239030/A
* **Publication Date**: February 22, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: April 3, 2023 (2:00 PM)
* **Amendment Date**: March 23, 2023

### Tender Notice

* **Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Method**: Competitive - Open bidding

### Solicitation Details

* **Goods and Services**: The solicitation is for the procurement of TARP TIE DOWN KITS
* **Description**: Amendment 002: This amendment addresses a vendor inquiry.
* **Attachments**: [Download amendments and solicitation documents](#download-attachments)

### Vendor Eligibility

* **Canadian Trade Agreements**: This solicitation is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Solicitation Address

* **Contracting Authority**: Department of National Defence
* **Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A0K2
* **Country**: Canada

### Contact Information

* **Name**: Megan McCandless
* **Email**: [megan.mccandless@forces.gc.ca](mailto:megan.mccandless@forces.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: Not applicable

### Viewing and Downloading Bid Documents

You can download the bid documents from the [Canada Business Network website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/document/publication/att/2023/02/22/597bd44bbef0bcca0b8e50386d1923d2/attachment/1/6/VI%20-%20Tarp%20Tie%20Down%20Kits%20-%20RF%20Pc%20English%20.pdf).

Adherence to the [Solicitation Terms and Conditions](#solicitation-terms-and-conditions) is mandatory for any bidder intending to participate in this solicitation. Bidder must register in Merx
